tosca_definition.name: service.yaml
tosca_definition.content:
tosca_definitions_version: tosca_simple_yaml_1_0

topology_template:
  node_templates:
    my-workstation:
      type: tosca.nodes.Compute
      attributes:
        private_address: localhost
        public_address: localhost

    hello:
      type: tosca.nodes.SoftwareComponent
      requirements:
        - host: my-workstation
      interfaces:
        Standard:
          create: playbooks/hello/create.yml

content.name: create.yml
content.content:
---
- hosts: all
  become: no
  gather_facts: no
  tasks:
    - name: Make the location
      file:
        path: /tmp/playing-opera/hello
        recurse: true
        state: directory

    - name: Ansible was here
      file:
        path: /tmp/playing-opera/hello/hello.txt
        state: touch

content.name: delete.yml
content.content:
---
- hosts: all
  become: no
  gather_facts: no
  tasks:
    - name: delete folder
      file:
        path: /tmp/playing-opera
        state: absent
